JobFullDesc: In Recruiting, our partnership with the business is a core strategic driver of Facebook’s success and ability to hire top talent. We are looking for an experienced Engagement Program Manager to partner closely with our different Product Groups to drive cross-functional initiatives and reporting for employee outreach, interviewing, closing activities and referrals.
